import { ProductCardContainer} from "./productCardStyle" const ProductCard = () => { const {addItemToCart, cart, product} = props return ( <>

{`Número ${props.id}`}

{props.name}

{`R$ ${props.value}`}

    {cart.map((product) => (
  • {product.name} ({product.quantity})
    • ))}

Total: {cart.reduce((total, product) => total + product.price, 0)}

 ) } export default ProductCard
